about_the_game:
This includes one track: the game's instrumental theme song titled "There's Always A Hero," which can be heard on the game's title screen and a few times throughout the course of the game.

1. The instrumental main theme "There's Always a Hero" that plays whenever the action picks up

Note that this only contains the one track from the game. It is not a complete soundtrack of all music in the game. This is the only music from the game for sale.

content_descriptors.notes: While the game "There's Always a Madman: Fight or Flight" contains some violence and sexual innuendo, the theme song is much more generalized.  As such, please note that it does have some lyrics that make reference to violence and sexual innuendo, but is largely on par with what you would find in a James Bond theme song.  If you have any doubts about the subject matter, you can listen to the theme song for yourself on the title screen of the free demo.
